extendedInfo.description: 40 US & UK Military Bugle Calls. Settable as either ringtone, notification, individual contact ringtone or alarm.They make awesome ringtones/notifications, especially alarms!!HIGH QUALITY SOUND.SEE SCREENSHOTS FOR CLIPS INCLUDED.FEATURES:* Set as phone ringtone* Set as phone notification* Set as individual contact ringtone - Once a theme has been set as either a ringtone or notification it will be available in the phone ringtone list so that it may be set as an individual contact ringtone.Press to play and long press to set as ringtone or notfication.Excellent sound quality.Any suggestions are welcome.Any problems please email for a fix.
